document_data.name: Zastreva
document_data.mainbody:
'''Zastreva''' was an Untaken of [[Umberlee]], a member of the Bitch Queen's [[Church of Umberlee|clergy]] under Flood Tide [[Allandra Grey]] of the [[Water Queen's House]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Fish's piss - I loved Holli as much as anyone, but they've been wailing and praying for hours. My best pot for a bit of quiet.''|Untaken Zastreva}}
document_data.Description: Zastreva was a fair-skinned [[human]] woman with blond hair and blue eyes. Her skin was freckled and hair was gathered in two ponytails. Zastreva's garb was a simple jerkin and a tunic, as well as a cook's [[apron]] and a [[chef's toque|toque blanche]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Untaken Zastreva was serving in the Water Queen's House's kitchens. After the death of [[Holli Dylford]], a member of the church, Untaken [[Padulla]] and Untaken Zastreva worked on a funeral feast to the served in the drowned [[priestess]]' honor. Despite her affections for the deceased, Zastreva was appoyed by the service and its incessant singing.
